metadata.name: Create and Update Tool Entries in Libraries
metadata.description: Create new tool JSON files or enrich existing tools in LIBRARIES/Tools/ based on validated tool list from video taxonomy extraction
metadata.context: in LIBRARIES/Tools based on gap analysis
prerequisites: Tool data extracted from video transcription

outputs: New tool JSON files created in LIBRARIES/Tools/
Existing tool entries enriched with new data
Tool IDs assigned to all new tools

steps.description: Review tool validation report from TASK-TEMPLATE-VIDEO-005 to see which tools are new vs existing
steps.output: Clear list of new tools to create and existing tools to enrich

steps.description: For each new tool, create JSON file following schema: tool_id, name, category, subcategories, description, key_features, use_cases, integrations, pricing, url, tasks, skills
steps.output: New tool JSON files created in appropriate category folders

steps.description: For existing tools, add new use_cases, integrations, tasks, and skills discovered from video
steps.output: Existing tool JSON files enriched with new data

steps.description: Validate all created/updated JSON files against LIBRARIES schema, check for proper formatting
steps.output: All JSON files validated and properly formatted

quality_checklist: All new tools have JSON files created
All existing tools enriched with new data
JSON schema validation passed for all files
integrations array includes tools from our stack
url field contains valid tool website
tasks array references Task Template IDs
skills array contains skill phrases with tools
Files saved to correct category subdirectory in LIBRARIES/Tools/

version_history.changes: Updated for Project-Template-008 integration, simplified for Stage 3 population, changed from RESEARCH to cross-functional, reduced complexity and duration (5-10 min), focused on tool JSON creation/enrichment only
